sense.gloss: to know, to be aware (of), to be conscious (of), to learn (of), to find out, to discover
to sense, to feel, to notice, to realize
to understand, to comprehend, to grasp, to appreciate
to remember, to be familiar with, to be acquainted with
to experience, to go through, to know (e.g. hardship)
to get acquainted with (a person), to get to know
to have to do with, to be concerned with, to be one's concern, to be one's responsibility

sdata.j: その↑答↑↓こた↓えを↑知↑↓|し↓る|のにあなたは↑本当↑↓ほんとう↓にその↑質問↑↓しつもん↓をする↑必要↑↓ひつよう↓があるのかしら。
sdata.e: Do you really need to ask the question to know the answer?

sdata.j: またいつか↑風↑↓かぜ↓のように↑走↑↓は|し↓る|んだ。
sdata.e: Someday I'll run like the wind.

sdata.j: ↑沈黙↑↓ちんもく↓は↑承諾↑↓しょうだく↓の↑印↑↓|しる|し↓。
↑彼↑↓かれ↓を↑知↑↓|し↓る|↑人↑↓ひと↓は↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑事↑↓こと↓が↑好↑↓す↓きです。
sdata.e: Those who know him like him.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑遅↑↓おそ↓かれ↑早↑↓はや↓かれ、そのやり↑方↑↓かた↓を↑知↑↓|し↓る|だろう。
sdata.e: You'll learn how to do it sooner or later.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑恥↑↓はじ↓を↑知↑↓|し↓る|べきだ。
↑君↑↓きみ↓はいつか↑真相↑↓しんそう↓を↑知↑↓|し↓る|だろう。
sdata.e: You will know the truth some day.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓たちは、↑何↑↓なに↓を↑読↑↓よ↓むべきかを↑知↑↓|し↓る|べきです。
sdata.e: You should know what to read.

sdata.j: ↑興↑↓きょう↓ざめの↑人↑↓ひと↓も、よく↑知↑↓|し↓る|ようになると、かならずしも↑不快↑↓ふかい↓ではない。
sdata.e: Wet blankets are not always unpleasant after you get to know them.

sdata.j: ↑貴社↑↓きしゃ↓に↑関↑↓かん↓して↑知↑↓|し↓る|↑機会↑↓きかい↓をいただき、↑感謝↑↓かんしゃ↓します。
sdata.e: We appreciate the opportunity you've given us to learn more about your organization.
